item.title: Our Advanced Weed Detection Model
item.description: Weeds significantly impact agricultural production, and traditional weed control methods often harm soil health and the environment. This study aims to develop deep learning-based segmentation models to identify weeds in potato fields captured by Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) orthophotos and to explore the effects of weeds on potato yield.
